div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1364 Asia Minor, northern?, c. 1960 Burial: c. 325-300 B.C. Contents: "many" AR Byzantium: "many" hemidr. Calchedon: "many" hemidr. Disposition: dispersed Le Rider, Deux trim's, p. 44 Apparently no part of this hd. has entered the Archaeological Museum in Istan- bul. It is not mentioned by Schönert- Geiss, Münzprägung Byzantion
